channel.title: Cache Downloading
channel.description:
Well my cache downloader should be extracting in to, user.home on whatever user your own.
But it wont extract everything it says requesting title screen then it tries re connecting.
If anyone can help please and give me a pm would appreciate it :) will rep++

item.title: Cache Downloading
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Is platform independent and therefore will work with ANY operating system (Windows, Linux, Mac). You're probably not using it correctly. If you want proper help you should post the code.
